SELECT DISTINCT
cp.start_time AS startTime, cp.end_time AS endTime FROM court_info c, court_product cp WHERE c.id = cp.court_id AND c.area = #{area} AND cp.start_time >= '${time}' AND cp.end_time <= CONCAT('${time}', '23:59:59')

SELECT DISTINCT c.area as area, c.`Name` as name, cp.court_id as courtId, cp.id as pid, cp.start_time AS startTime, cp.end_time AS endTime FROM court_info c, court_product cp WHERE c.id = cp.court_id AND c.area = #{area} AND cp.start_time >= '${time}' AND cp.end_time <= CONCAT('${time}', '23:59:59') ORDER BY cp.start_time ASC, c.name ASC
